name: Manufacturer site - SkateHouseBD
description: This is a Manufacturer site of SkateHouse made with ReactJS. Included Firebase Authentication system, Tailwind & DaisyUI as CSS framework and ExpressJS, NodeJS & MongoDB as back-end environment. A Dashboard with user profile, user orders & add review sections and an Admin Panel with add product, manage product & manage orders sections are included.

name: Warehouse site - FurnitureHut
description: This is a Warehouse site of FurnitureHut made with ReactJS. Included Firebase Authentication system, React-Bootstrap as CSS framework and ExpressJS, NodeJS & MongoDB as back-end environment. Features like adding new products, managing all products, Blogs Login & Registration systems etc. are main here.

name: Corporate Sales Trainer site - ALLENCORP
description: This site is for a Corporate Sales Trainer made with ReactJS. Included Firebase Authentication system, React-Bootstrap as CSS framework and ExpressJS, NodeJS & MongoDB as back-end environment. All services, Blogs and Login & Registration systems are the main in this site.
